title: FPS Dropping for no reason
body:
I have a 1080ti, i7 7700k with 16 gb ram. why am I suffering from fps issues. Ive heard it has something to do with the new patch but I have not yet have had this confirmed. Does anyone know why im getting drops from 200+ down to 5-10 fps. Its making the game unplayable. ive pdated my gpu drivers and repaired league so far as steps. 

ps. no other games has this happen to it. eg. WoW Prey Doom Warhammer.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I can agree this is happening
welp i'm still getting the fps drops normally i get 120 fps but just played some games and had 6-21 fps AHH SO PAINFUL.

Ok so there has been an issue with fps drops on high end PCs. This is the latest update:
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/GlIAFKNQ-fps-drops-data-gathering

Even if your issue is unrelated they're probably more able to point you in the right direction.
cheers for the link, i'll try and pass it around to all the people i know that have been having FPS issues (and use it myself as well)
Damn bro, you need to find a better game to play with those specs ;)
My specs are around the same but i sometimes get frame rate drop when my laptop overheats. The comp forces itself to work less and slow down so it doesn't melt.
